description:
- Something has definitely happened… to the moon goddess Tsukuyomi! -
A strange phenomenon has been occurring recently in which the moon is full every single night.
Ren and the others encounter the monster Suihanjar, who`s on patrol to protect all the town`s dinner tables,
and learn that the moon goddess Tsukuyomi is probably behind the moon incident. What has happened to Tsukuyomi?
